admission_text:
###### Janice Mason Art Museum

# Museum Support

##### Support levels for everyone—from students to our most generous supporters!

Thanks to the generous contributions of our members, benefactors, and other community leaders, JMAM is now celebrating over 28 years of exemplary arts presentations. Your continued support will ensure that JMAM will remain a dynamic cultural resource that’s open and accessible to all.

Gifts and contributions to JMAM can be made in a variety of ways, including cash donations, checks, charges, [stock transfers](https://jmam.org/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/Stock-Transfer-Guidelines4.pdf "Donate through stock transfer") (more detailed instructions on stock transfers can be obtained by clicking [here](https://jmam.org/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/Stock-Transfer-Guidelines4.pdf "Donate through stock transfer")), or giving of one’s time through volunteering.

You may become involved in the arts center in many different ways. Contact us to learn more about any of these opportunities to become involved in the Janice Mason Art Museum or Southern Kentucky Independent Theatre.

[ Make a Secure Donation ](https://jmam-skit-secure.thrivecart.com/donate/?ref=ws_mem_pg)

##  Become a Member 

Become a member: We always welcome new and renewing members. Our organization cannot exist without our supporting friends.

Membership levels and benefits

## Annual Memberships

  * $15 Student

  * $35 Individual Friend

  * $60 Family Friend

  * $100 Partner **

  * $150 ...
collections_text:
# Welcome to The Cadiz Community Arts Center

[](https://jmam.org/artseats/)

### UPCOMING EVENTS

  * Jan 8-Feb 17 – Bluegrass Brooms exhibit
  * Jan 27 – Make & Mingle: Alcohol Ink Cardmaking
  * Feb 14 – Chocolate Affair
  * Feb 21 – Ben Maddox & Christina Conroy exhibit opens
  * Feb 24 – Make & Mingle: Wet Felting
  * Feb 28 – ARTalks: Dr. Brian Clardy
  * [MORE – 2026 JMAM calendar of events](calendar-of-events/)
  * [2026 JMAM Class calendar](class-schedule)

### WHO WE ARE

The Cadiz Community Arts Center is a 501(c)3 nonprofit community arts center which serves as the umbrella organization for the Janice Mason Art Museum and Southern Kentucky Independent Theatre. We are not a collecting museum, but focus on bringing quality art, in all its forms, to the community. Programming includes 8-10 exhibits each year by artists from around the local area, region, and the world representing a broad variety of media and genre. We produce at least one theatrical offering per year, and offer classes and workshops in several disciplines.

### WHERE WE ARE

**Janice Mason Art Museum** ,  
71 Main Street  
P.O. Box 303, Cadiz, KY 42211   
**Hours: Tuesday-Saturday 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM; Sunday 1:00 PM - 4:00 PM.**   
[270-522-9056](tel:270-522-9056)  
[jmam.skit@gmail.com ](mailto:jmam.skit@gmail.com)
